title: Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s chest for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s chest for a single woman. The chest of a lover for an unmarried woman in a dream shows some things that may differ from time to time, whether this lover is old or current. The subject may take the form of an expression of longing in the case of the former, but if it is from the person she is related to in her life, it carries many It is a sign of love and friendship, and we will explain to you many interpretations related to this dream. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s breast for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a lover’s dream about a single woman’s breast? A dream about a lover hugging an unmarried woman can be interpreted as a strong relationship with this person in reality and her strong connection With him and always taking his opinion on the affairs of her life. The dream may be an interpretation of her strong desire to meet this man and marry him as a result of her feeling of comfort and great love for him, which she hopes will result in an official engagement. Some people interested in the science of interpretation expect that the unmarried woman will most likely be in a relationship. With the man whom she saw formally embracing in the dream at the first opportunity, God willing. If she saw that she was hugging her old lover, experts believe that the dream is a confirmation of how little this person is and that it brought him many feelings and memories that he cannot forget. Seeing the first can also be interpreted that he will return To her, he repents for all the bad deeds he did against her, thinks about his engagement, and seeks to love her again. Interpretation experts tend to the idea that the idea of ​​a hug in a dream is one of the indicators of extreme need and lack, and therefore if a girl embraces an old or current lover, this means that she is psychologically affected by some Events. He wishes for a feeling of stability. Interpretation of a dream about the chest of a lover of an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the chest of a lover of an unmarried woman is one of the things that shows the girl’s complete trust in this young man and her intense love for him, and that is why she sees his embrace in the dream. The interpretation of this vision also explains to her that it is an indication of The real and official relationship with this person in a short period and the girl’s love and warmth with him are the result of this man’s desire to make her happy. The dream may relate to the great thought of this lover and the girl who wants to be by his side at all times, and thus the subconscious expresses this topic through the world of dreams. While watching the girl hugging her ex-lover, she expresses the grief and sadness that she is currently experiencing due to the separation and her loss terribly, but she is afraid of returning to him again because of the things she saw in her relationship with him. Among the interpretations of the previous dream is also that it indicates the sadness of the old lover and his grief over the separation between him and this woman. The girl and his desire to return to her life and regain her trust. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google. The most important interpretations of a lover embracing a single dream. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s chest and an unmarried woman’s kiss. An unmarried girl may see her lover’s chest and kiss him in a dream, and this is evidence of the sincere relationship that unites them in life.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a store in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a store in a dream: Large stores or shops such as a place for commercial buying and selling, called a shopping center, where various forms of commercial products are displayed, from clothing, food, electrical appliances, etc. A sign and good news for living and the good that lots and lots of money brings, and this is enough for the store so that it does not make it clear that there are products or materials that are old and expire in the dream. Interpretation of seeing the store in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Researcher Ibn Sirin says that seeing the store in a dream shows good news of decent living and money that will be obtained. It is for the dream owner in the near future. If the closet in the dream is old and does not contain goods, the dream owner may warn of a financial crisis in the near future. If the store contains expensive goods that the owner cannot buy in the dream. This may indicate that there are some The problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces, which are difficult to get rid of. Low prices in the dream store may indicate the low moral level of the dreamer. But if the dreamer sees goods with fixed prices, then this vision indicates the stability of the dreamer’s circumstances. Interpretation of seeing a store in a dream by the Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq says: Whoever buys from a store in a dream and if the prices are suitable for him. This vision shows the ability of the dreamer to achieve his goals and aspirations. If the store is large in the dream, this indicates a lot of good and spacious life that the dreamer enjoys. The Imam says Sincerely, the presence of a large store full of goods is considered good news for unmarried couples in the near future, whether it is a dream of a young man or a girl. If the store in the dream sells toys in the dream, then this vision indicates that the dreamer should return to his childhood days back in the day. Other.Interpretation of the vision of buying in a dream for a single girl. This can be interpreted in the dream that if an unmarried girl sees that she wants and desires something, then she hardens it with her small and simple money that she cannot buy. This may indicate that this single girl is living in a state of frustration and sadness. And despair, but for a very short time she will return to her normal life soon, God willing. It can also explain that if an unmarried girl dreams that she wants to buy a car, a house, or anything very valuable and expensive to buy. This may indicate that she will succeed in her life in exchange for something important Extremely. And to reach the highest stage and succeed in her life as well. The future is very easy. This can also be interpreted that if a girl sees in her dream that she wants to buy food, drink or meat, then this can indicate what our souls desire. Really very good food. This can also be interpreted that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she can buy some foods available in the market in abundance. This may indicate the fulfillment of the desires and dreams of this single girl. Also, if these foods are expensive, this indicates that she You will live in prosperity under all circumstances, and God is Most High

title: Interpretation of the dream of a married woman who marries without her husband by Ibn Sirin and interpretation of the dream of a married woman who marries someone she knows

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying someone other than her husband. The vision of marriage is one of the good visions that leave good impressions on the soul of its owner, but what matters to a married woman who sees that she is marrying someone other than her husband? What is the significance of this? This vision carries many clues that vary based on many considerations, including that the person you are marrying may be a stranger, an acquaintance, or a relative. What is important to us in this article is that we take a look at all the indicators and cases of a married woman’s dream of marrying someone. Other than her husband. Learn about the interpretation of the dream of a married woman without her husband marrying from Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of the dream of a married woman who marries without her husband. The vision of marriage expresses the achievement of goals and objectives, the achievement of goals, meeting needs and divine providence, attaining positions and prestige, and fulfilling an absent desire. This vision also indicates On concerns, responsibilities, duties, difficult issues, debts, and restrictions, this vision includes two aspects, one positive and the other non-negative, but it expresses the nature of the world in which there is no stability. Nor permanent happiness. But if a married woman sees that she is getting married in a dream, this indicates her ambition to build a bright future and work hard to provide the requirements of life, good management, taking into account all the incidents around her, and insuring her increasing demands. Tomorrow. If a woman sees that she is marrying someone other than her husband, this could be an indication of the existence of projects and plans that she intends to benefit from in the long term, and that she will receive some good news that she was preoccupied with, and the solution of a complex problem. An issue and knowledge of the aspects of complexity and ambiguity. This vision is also an indication of success in overcoming a crisis and great distress and giving up the things dear to her heart to achieve stability and cohesion in the livelihood of family members. If she sees that she is marrying a merchant, this indicates that she will obtain benefit in her home, and increase... A living income, and always thinking about how to provide for her children’s needs, which expresses the nature of the seer, her goodness. Morals and the love that fills her heart. Interpretation of the dream of a married woman marrying without her husband from Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the vision of marriage expresses companionship, love, union of hearts, overlooking faults, care, generosity, psychological harmony, self-determination, and making deferred decisions. This vision also expresses an orientation towards new experiences, Entering into adventures through which insight gains many experiences, and a constant ambition to achieve more special goals and aspirations. If a married woman sees that she is marrying someone other than her husband, this indicates a very short birth and pregnancy if she is able to do so, and the gender of the newborn may be female, and God knows best. On the other hand, this vision is an indication of the presence of someone who is trying to tempt her with her religion and world, and who is pursuing her and aims to reconcile her with her husband, and to expose the shortcomings, faults, and negatives that distinguish her, to stay away from him and favor others over him. The vision of marriage without a husband also indicates multiple sources of livelihood or income.

title: Interpretation of a dream about ducks for an unmarried woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about ducks for an unmarried woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Ducks are a type of bird, but they cannot fly. They are of different types, some black, some colorful, some gray, and also green, except for the presence of species that live in fresh water, some in salt water, and some of which like to eat their meat. It can be cooked in different ways, and seeing it in a dream has many interpretations. Learn the interpretation of a dream about ducks about an unmarried woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Here is this article. Interpretation of a dream about ducks for an unmarried woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The famous dream interpreter Ibn Sirin has his own point of view on dreams, where he puts The appropriate interpretations on it, and he often extracts it from the Holy Qur’an, and in his interpretation of the dream of seeing ducks in a single girl’s dream, he said: Seeing them in one dream is one of the happy dreams. If the girl is a student, this indicates her success in her studies. If she is working, this is an indication of Her success in her work and achieving huge profits. Anyone who dreams of ducks and hopes to get a job after graduation, his wishes will come true. It shows that he has obtained a prestigious job. Or it may indicate a dream, according to what Ibn Sirin narrated, that a marriage will happen soon for an unmarried girl. It could be His life partner is handsome and rich. Well, you will live with him happily. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing ducks in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing ducks in a dream for a single woman. When an unmarried girl dreams that she saw ducks, this is a sign of goodness in general. It also indicates: the coming of her good and abundant food. Seeing it may be an indication of her division and survival in her work or other areas of her life. But if she sees a fat white duck, this indicates good news for her that she will get married soon. It may also indicate her success in a new project that she will enter into. Seeing one duck It means that he will travel to a distant land. And also to benefit from this trip. And if he sees ducks swimming in the water, or sees a group of ducks together. It expresses happiness in her life. If she sees duck feathers in her dream, this indicates the end of her problems and fears that she suffers from. This also indicates health and blessings in money. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a slaughtered duck in a dream and its consequences. Interpretation of a dream about white ducks in a dream for a single woman. The meaning of seeing white ducks is different from black ducks in a dream. Seeing white ducks in a person’s dream indicates many things: She excelled and succeeded in her academic and professional life. Also, this dream indicates that you hear good news. In addition, it indicates the fulfillment of the desires that you wish to achieve. Or that seeing white ducks in a dream For a person, it can mean a lot of money. In addition to getting good things in the near future. As for an unmarried woman who sees yellow ducks, it is a sign of the girl’s virtue and purity. In addition, it is characterized by good morals. Seeing yellow ducks in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she avoids... Committing sins and abominations. The little yellow duck shows her good news. It is also food for her family and abundant goodness. See

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a broken mobile phone for single, married or divorced women?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about breaking a mobile vessel for a married and divorced woman? There are no interpretations for this dream from Ibn Sirin or other scholars due to its lack in his time, because technology is modern and emerging, but we can measure this dream through ancient communications such as telegrams. The messenger sent, and the flying pigeon, and the interpretation of the dream varies according to the dreamer and the details of the dream, so it has many interpretations, and among these interpretations are the following: Seeing a person with a mobile phone falling from him and breaking in a dream is evidence that all your near and distant relationships can be destroyed, as losing and damaging the phone is evidence of losing many of your relatives and relatives. The surrounding area. Some commentators said that breaking and losing the phone is evidence of losing the source and losing a lot of money, compared to the interpretation of ancient scholars in interpreting the loss of the message in ancient media. The phone falling from the dreamer's hand in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is going through a trial period for different people around him, and if the phone is completely destroyed in the dream, this is a clear indication of financial loss and failure. And the loss of loved ones. Whoever sees his phone screen broken in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will hear bad news that will anger him and he may lose his temper with some of his loved ones and the relationship between them will collapse. . A man sees the phone in his dream falling on him and breaking, then he struggles to fix it, but every effort ends in failure, which is a clear indication that the dreamer will fall into a difficult situation or a bad event, due to many. . The mistakes he made. Some contemporary dream interpreters said that seeing a broken phone may sometimes indicate enemies and a warning and warning to the dreamer and the danger he may fall into because of their presence. Seeing the same man looking at his broken phone in a dream is complete evidence that the dreamer will hear unpleasant news about his social, financial and professional life. Seeing a married woman with a broken mobile phone in a dream indicates the occurrence of some marital and family problems, in addition to many family disputes. A woman who sees herself repairing her completely broken phone in a dream is a sign of resolving all the pending issues between her and her husband, overcoming all differences and repairing the shaky relationship between them. Whoever works in trade and sees that his mobile phone fell from his hand into a deep hole and broke, this is evidence that the fortuneteller heard a lot of bad news about his work and work and the loss of a lot of money and customers. . What is the interpretation of a dream about a broken mobile phone for a man. There are many scientific interpretations of the ancient interpretation of the loss of old means of communication such as the loss of a carrier pigeon or the damage of the message or the death of the sent messenger and what is the interpretation of the dream of collapse. . Human motives are based on the interpretation of the ancients due to the loss or damage of old means of communication. Among these interpretations are the following: A man seeing that his mobile phone falls from his hands in a dream and breaks completely is evidence that the relationship between this man and his wife is an abnormal relationship full of many disputes and family problems, and

title: Interpretation of Pepsi in a dream: Drinking Pepsi in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of Pepsi, Coca-Cola, Elephanta 7-Up drinks, soft drinks, sugar-sweetened water, buying cans of Pepsi by Ibn Sirin, and more. Sugary drinks in a dream have many connotations. They have good or bad explanations. This is what we will learn through our topic today, about the interpretation of seeing juices and sugary drinks in a dream, according to the opinions of major commentators. Interpretation of sparkling water in a dream Seeing sparkling water in a dream can indicate anger or the fire of hell, because sparkling water evaporates and anger also intensifies, and so does hell boil, he says. God Almighty says: {If they are thrown into it, they hear her gasping as she leaves. If you dream of a Coca-Cola company, this indicates your success in winning the love of others and convincing them of your opinion and point of view. This also demonstrates your ability to communicate with others. If a woman dreams that she is drinking Coke This means that she will lose her health and the opportunity to marry a well-off man because of her indulgence in physical pleasures. title: The 22 most famous interpretations of seeing zakat in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing zakat in a dream? It indicates the appearance of goodness. The interpretation of seeing zakat in a dream? Evidence of frequent worship and adherence to religious teachings. Interpretation of seeing paying zakat? Guide to getting rid of problems and worries. What is the meaning of seeing a single person in a dream with zakat money? It indicates that he will get married soon. What is the interpretation? Seeing zakat in a patient’s dream? Evidence of his recovery from illness. Interpretation of a dream about zakat by Ibn Sirin. Zakat in a dream indicates a manifestation of kindness and is also evidence of following a broad diet. Seeing zakat in a dream indicates the blessing that will come in the life of the dreamer. If the dreamer sees in a dream That he pays zakat to the poor, this is an indication that he will obtain a lot of money in the coming period. Seeing zakat in a dream indicates a lot of worship and attachment to the teachings of religion. If one sees in a dream that he is paying zakat, this means that he will repay the debt. Seeing paying zakat can It indicates relief from the problems and fears present in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a dream about zakat for a man. If the man is one who has committed sins and sees in a dream that he is paying zakat, this indicates repentance and drawing closer to God. If a man sees in a dream that he is paying zakat al-fitr, this indicates that he Lots of praise. Seeing zakat in a man’s dream can be a sign of success and achieving goals. When an unmarried person sees metal zakat in a dream, this indicates that he will get married soon. Seeing a dream about zakat from NablusZakat money in a dream is a sign of the collapse of worries and freedom from problems. Vision Zakat is a sign of good health and salvation from illness. Seeing zakat in a patient’s dream may indicate his recovery from illness. If a person sees in a dream that he is giving zakat in silver or any coin, this indicates abundant sustenance and procreation. Seeing a person in a dream that he is giving zakat Breaking the fast, this indicates prayer and glorification. Interpretation of a dream about zakat for a married woman. If a married woman sees zakat on coins in a dream, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. If he sees that he is receiving zakat, this indicates a benefit that he will receive in the near future. If a married woman sees In a dream, she pays zakat to the poor and needy, so her distress is alleviated and she is absolved of debts. Interpretation of a dream about zakat for a single woman: Seeing a girl educated in zakat in a dream means that she helps others. If she sees a dead person in a dream giving zakat, then this dream deserves her praise. If she sees that he pays zakat To the deceased, and he refused, this is evidence of the forbidden money that he takes from a reprehensible act.

title: Interpretation of seeing that I am in front of my prayer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing that I am an imam praying in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com. The slave is with his master. Therefore, we will talk about the interpretation of this vision through our article about the single girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the man, the young man, and the divorced woman. What is the interpretation of seeing the prayer leader in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing the prayer leader in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates the seriousness of the dreamer’s religiosity, good morals, and good behavior among his family and friends. Seeing performing prayer in a dream, with many worries and major problems in the dreamer’s life, indicates the death of sorrows from life, his psychological stability, and his ability to solve his problems and get rid of sad days. Seeing prayer in a dream indicates that the dreamer is satisfied with his life and with the many blessings in his life, and that God helps him to achieve it. Achieving his life's dream. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer in the mosque in a dream. What is the interpretation of a man who sees the prayer leader in a dream? Seeing a man trying to get closer to God. Maintaining his prayers in a dream and his great need to help those around him indicates his sense of security and great superiority in his academic and professional life. Seeing a married man crying intensely while praying in a dream is a sign of perseverance in success, achieving goals, and staying away from bad friends. Seeing a married person praying in a dream indicates a quiet life full of joy and happiness and trying to stay away from stress and fear. See also: Interpretation of seeing praying in a church in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a single girl praying in a dream? Seeing a single girl praying with a young man she knows in a dream means fulfilling her lifelong dream of marrying her lover and starting a beautiful life with him. Seeing a single girl holding a pen, constantly asking for forgiveness and praying behind a righteous man indicates her husband’s good morals, kindness of heart, and wisdom among people. A girl who sees herself praying with strangers indicates her strong personality and she leads the important things in her life without resorting to anyone else. What is the interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream? I see myself praying in a dream while sitting without illness showing his pride in doing good in front of people and that God does not accept any work from him. Seeing prayer in the fortuneteller’s sleep indicates the deterioration of his health and his suffering from many diseases. Seeing myself praying while driving in the car indicates constant fear and anxiety about life and many problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone leading prayer in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Shaheen praying in a dream? The dream. By performing the noon prayer, Ibn Shaheen has visions that herald all goodness, happiness and joy in the future for its owner. Seeing the Eid prayer in a dream means the return of the beloved to the dreamer from travels and the arrival of goodness and sustenance to him. Seeing prayer in a dream is a sign of blessing in food and a lot of money. Seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream is a sign of loss of sadness. And distress and improvement of the material condition of the visions. Seeing long prostration in prayer indicates the ability of the dreamer to achieve amazing successes and everything he wishes for the future. What is the interpretation of seeing a young man praying in a dream? Seeing a young man praying in a dream is

title: Interpretation of seeing a deceased person sad and crying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dead sad and crying in a dream When searching for the interpretation of seeing the dead sad and crying in a dream, it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and whether it is so. It is a sign of good and evil. The dream and its interpretation are good, and it is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of seeing the deceased sad and crying in a dream. It is possible that seeing the deceased is sad and crying may indicate worries and problems that the dreamer faces in his life during this period. The crying and sadness of the deceased in a dream may indicate financial hardship. Or financial crises that the dreamer faces during these days. If the person sees that the deceased was crying and very sad, this may indicate that there is a problem in his workplace and he must seek God’s help. If the girl sees that the deceased is very sad and crying, this may indicate changes in Her life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dead asking forgiveness from living people in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that the dead person asked him to forgive him, it is possible that he needed charity at that time, and God knows best. The living person’s request for forgiveness from the dead person may indicate his need for forgiveness. To pray in those days. Anyone who sees in a dream that the deceased was asking the living to forgive him may indicate the difficulties that the dreamer may face in his life at that time and he must ask for God’s help. Dreaming of the dead asking forgiveness from the living may indicate changes Things happen to the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a deceased person buying new clothes for himself in a dream. Seeing a deceased person buying new clothes in a dream may indicate the protection that the dreamer gains during this period, thanks to God. A dream about a deceased person presenting the dreamer with new clothes may indicate To the abundance of money that the dreamer obtains at that time, thanks to God. If the deceased sees that the deceased was buying new clothes, this may indicate the blessings that he enjoyed, and God knows best. To see yourself buying new clothes in a dream may indicate good things to come and happiness. Which will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about burying the dead inside the house in a dream: In the event that a person sees the deceased buried inside the house, this could indicate that the dreamer is traveling or working far from his family. Dreaming about burying the dead inside the house in a dream may It indicates a wedding date or upcoming joy for the people of the house, thanks to God. If you see in a dream the deceased being buried inside the house and the people of the house are crying, this may indicate changes that are occurring in the lives of the people of the house at that time and they must seek God’s help. . If a person sees the dead being buried inside the house in a dream, this may indicate the problems that the people of the house faced at that time, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing the dead person sitting on the carpet in a dream. Seeing the dead person praying on the prayer rug indicates the great status of God, Blessed and Most High, and God knows best. Whoever sees in his place that the dead person is praying, he can point to the beneficial deeds that the deceased did in his life with the grace of God. In the event of a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream

preview.html: Many people look around at the interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream, as it is considered one of the common visions that cause anxiety and discomfort to the fortuneteller, especially if what he saw was a big lion and not a small lion, as lions are the strongest animals, which made them bear the title of king of the jungle, and its female is known as a lioness, thirty names, Some of them name their children after their strength, ferocity, and status, as they are among the most predatory animals capable of chasing their prey with the utmost skill, speed, and lethality. When the dreamer sees him in a dream, the dream is in different situations, as he sees a lion attacking or biting him, or it is a pet playing with the dreamer and the Prophet will not harm him. God Yusuf bin when Jacob, may God bless him and grant him peace, saw a dream about which his father told him, according to the great saying of God in Surat Yusuf, verse five (He said: “O my son, do not tell your vision to your brothers, lest they commit a plot against you, a plot against you”).Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dreamWe will show you in the following paragraph what The great scholar Ibn Sirin said about seeing a lion in a dream: Seeing it in a dream means that there is a traitor or enemy in his life who is conspiring against him. The dreamer seeing the lion standing in front of him and looking at him indicates that he will fall into a dilemma or predicament from which he will suffer severely, God forbid. To the dreamer's house symbolizes the illness or sadness of a family member, and if one of them is afflicted with a disease, he needs medical attention and urgent treatment in order to be cured of this disease. His entry into the city and his wandering around suggests that it is suffering from the spread of disease and the ignorance of that city. Riding on the back of a lion, like riding a horse, is evidence that He travels to a place he doesn't like and will never return to or will return from after a long time. It can also indicate a romantic relationship full of problems. Climbing on the back of a lion and riding a fortune teller to tame it indicates the victory of God Almighty over the oppressors. Seeing a lioness in a dream, a female lion and his wife, indicates the presence of a woman in the dreamer’s life with a bad reputation and a bad personality, and this dream is a warning. By staying away from her and ending his relationship with her. Seeing the dreamer as if he had turned into a lion in a dream is evidence that he may turn into an arrogant, oppressive person who oppresses those around him. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a single woman: In the following points we provide an interpretation for a single woman who sees a lion in a dream: Seeing an unmarried woman, an unmarried girl, whom a lion looks at from afar in a dream indicates the presence of a malicious man who wants to get close to her, but he hides the evil in himself and does not do so. To harm her, and therefore she must be careful of what she will experience in relationships in the coming period. Seeing a number of lions attacking her and being able to reach them indicates that she has fallen into many obstacles and problems. An unmarried woman eating lion meat symbolizes her pursuit of achieving her goals, and she will reach them soon. By God’s command. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman. Here are the connotations of a married woman who sees a lion in her dream: A married woman who sees a lion in a dream indicates the presence of a person who harbors hatred and envy and wants a mother who will inflict evil on her. A lion that attacks her and may bite her is an evil omen for
